title: Dying Light 2: Stay Human Offers Free Weekend Trial on PC
description: Techland, the developer behind the highly-anticipated Dying Light 2: Stay Human, has announced a limited-time free trial for PC players. title: Satoshi Nakamoto’s emails spill early Bitcoin secrets
description: A gold mine of conversations from the early days of blockchain crypto has been discovered, highlighting the initial talks between Bitcoin’s mysterious founder, Satoshi Nakamoto, and one of his first partners, Martti Malmi. This discovery was made when Malmi posted 120 pages of their email chats on GitHub on February 23. These documents were first […]

title: Customer Threatens to Sue Bank of America After Tens of Thousands of Dollars Vanishes Without a Trace: Report
description:
A Bank of America customer is considering whether to sue after the lender allegedly lost a certificate of deposit (CD) that has significantly grown in value after nearly 30 years. Realtor Enid Bavard says she bought a $10,000 CD in 1997 – money she set aside to help finance her son’s college education, reports Fox […]

title: ‘I Can Live With It’: Former President Donald Trump Changes Tune on Bitcoin, Calls for Regulation
description:
Donald Trump has changed his tune on Bitcoin (BTC). The former president and presumptive Republican nominee in 2024 fielded a question about the top crypto asset during a Fox News town hall in South Carolina this week. Trump says he prefers the US dollar but acknowledges that Bitcoin has taken on “a life of its […]
